body.data:
SELECT *
FROM (
  SELECT a.*, ROWNUM rnum
  FROM (
    SELECT 
      u.SUBS_ID,
      u.HOF_ID,
      u.USER_NAME,
      u.USER_PASSWORD,
      u.REG_DATE,
      u.DEVICE_ID,
      CASE u.FLG_ADMIN WHEN 1 THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS FLG_ADMIN_BOOL,
      CASE u.FLG_ENABLED WHEN 1 THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS FLG_ENABLED_BOOL,
      CASE u.FLG_BLOCKED WHEN 1 THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS FLG_BLOCKED_BOOL,
      u.FCM_TOKEN,
      u.MOBILE_NUMBER,
      u.DEVICE_TYPE,
      s1.NAME_E AS SUBSCRIBER_NAME,
      s2.NAME_E AS HOF_NAME
    FROM APP_USERS u
    LEFT JOIN CORE.VW_APPS_SUBS s1 ON s1.ID = u.SUBS_ID
    LEFT JOIN CORE.VW_APPS_SUBS s2 ON s2.ID = u.HOF_ID
    WHERE (
      {{ usersTable.searchText == "" ? "1=1" : 
        "LOWER(u.USER_NAME) LIKE LOWER('%"   + usersTable.searchText + "%')" +
        " OR LOWER(u.USER_PASSWORD) LIKE LOWER('%" + usersTable.searchText + "%')" +
			  " OR LOWER(u.SUBS_ID) LIKE LOWER('%" + usersTable.searchText + "%')" +
        " OR TO_CHAR(u.REG_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LIKE '%" + usersTable.searchText + "%'" +
        " OR LOWER(u.DEVICE_ID) LIKE LOWER('%" + usersTable.searchText + "%')" +
        " OR LOWER(u.FCM_TOKEN) LIKE LOWER('%" + usersTable.searchText + "%')" +
        " OR LOWER(u.MOBILE_NUMBER) LIKE LOWER('%" + usersTable.searchText + "%')" +
        " OR LOWER(u.DEVICE_TYPE) LIKE LOWER('%" + usersTable.searchText + "%')" +
        " OR LOWER(s1.NAME_E) LIKE LOWER('%" + usersTable.searchText + "%')" +
        " OR LOWER(s2.NAME_E) LIKE LOWER('%" + usersTable.searchText + "%')" }}
    )
    ORDER BY u.REG_DATE DESC
  ) a
  WHERE ROWNUM <= {{ usersTable.pageOffset + usersTable.pageSize }}
)
WHERE rnum > {{ usersTable.pageOffset }}
